parties: Joseph SALERA, Appellant v. STATE FARM FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, Appellee. James Mee, Appellant v. Safeco Insurance Company of America, Appellee. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeals are dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
